wikipedia_page.main: William Grant Mitchell (23 May 1865 – 14 January 1904) was an English rugby union fullback who was a member of the first official British Isles team. Mitchell represented several club teams and was an original member of touring team, the Barbarians.

response: * William Grant Mitchell (1865–1905), English international rugby union player
